REM ***** BASIC ***** option explicit
Dim sDocumentID_1 as String,sDocumentID_2 as String Dim sJahr as String,sJahr_1 as String,sJahr_2 as String Dim sMonat as String,sMonat_1 as String,sMonat_2 as String Dim iMonat as integer Dim sNummer_1 as String,sNummer_2 as String Dim sWert as String Dim sMenge as String,iMenge_eingeben as integer Dim oRecord1 as Object Dim vStatus as Variant Dim sSQL1 as String
Function fAnzahlSerienbriefe as Integer Dim oRecord1 as Object Dim sSQL1 as String sSQL1="select count(*) from Serienbrief_Kontakte where Serienbrief=1 and ClientID="& iClientID oRecord1=oResult(sSQL1) While oRecord1.next() fAnzahlSerienbriefe=oRecord1.getInt(1) Wend End Function
Function fstoreSerienbriefKontaktID as String Dim oRecord1 as Object Dim sSQL1 as String sSQL1="select group_concat(KontaktID separator ',') from Serienbrief_Kontakte where Serienbrief=1 and ClientID="& iClientID oRecord1=oResult(sSQL1) While oRecord1.next() fstoreSerienbriefKontaktID=oRecord1.getString(1) Wend End Function
Function fBemerkung as String sSQL1="select distinct Bemerkung from Document_Typ where Document_TypID="& iDocTypID oRecord1=oResult(sSQL1) While oRecord1.next() fBemerkung=oRecord1.getString(1) Wend End Function
Function LoadDialog_Korrespondenz(LibName as String, DialogName as String, Optional oLibContainer) Dim oLib as Object Dim oLibDialog as Object Dim oRuntimeDialog as Object If IsMissing(oLibContainer) then oLibContainer = DialogLibraries End If oLibContainer.LoadLibrary(LibName) oLib = oLibContainer.GetByName(LibName) oLibDialog = oLib.GetByName(DialogName) oRuntimeDialog = CreateUnoDialog(oLibDialog) LoadDialog_Korrespondenz() = oRuntimeDialog End Function
Function fVorhanden(sTabelName as string) as integer sSQL1="select count(*) from "& sTabelName &" where DocumentID="& lDocumentID &" and Pos="& fPos_neu oRecord1=oResult(sSQL1) While oRecord1.next() fVorhanden=oRecord1.getInt(1) Wend End Function
Function fAnzahl_Datensaetze(sTabelle as String,lDocumentID_param as Long) as integer sSQL1="select count(*) from "& sTabelle &" where DocumentID="& lDocumentID_param oRecord1=oResult(sSQL1) While oRecord1.next() fAnzahl_Datensaetze=oRecord1.getInt(1) Wend End Function
Function fDocumentOpen(DocumentName as String) as integer For iCount =1 to Application.Documents.Count if Application.Documents.Item(iCount).Name = DocumentName then fDocumentOpen=1 goto raus End if Next iCount fDocumentOpen=0 raus: End Function
Function fSelected_Item(oList as Object)as String Dim oList_View as Object oList_View=oDoc.CurrentController.getControl(oList) fSelected_Item=oList_View.SelectedItem() End Function
Function iAnzahl_Datensaetze(sTabelle as String) as integer sSQL1="select count(*) as Anzahl from "& sTabelle oRecord1=oResult(sSQL1) While oRecord1.next() iAnzahl_Datensaetze=oRecord1.getInt(1) Wend End Function
Function iDatensatznummer(sTabelle as String) as integer iDatensatznummer=iAnzahl_Datensaetze(sTabelle) - 1 End Function
Function iMax_Datensatz(sTabelle as String,sCol as String) as String sSQL1="select Max("& sCol &") from "& sTabelle oRecord1=oResult(sSQL1) While oRecord1.next() iMax_Datensatz=oRecord1.getInt(1) Wend End Function
Function iMin_Data(sTabelle as String,sCol as String) as String sSQL1="select Min("& sCol &") from "& sTabelle oRecord1=oResult(sSQL1) While oRecord1.next() iMin_Data=oRecord1.getInt(1) Wend End Function
Function fsNummern_Format as String sSQL1="select Nummern_Format from Einstellungen where EinstellungsID="& iEinstellungsID_lokal oRecord1=oResult(sSQL1) While oRecord1.next() fsNummern_Format=oRecord1.getString(1) Wend End Function
Function lDocumentID_import(iRefresh as integer) as long Dim sNummern_Format as String if iRefresh = 1 then sDocumentID_1=iMax_Datensatz(sKorrespondenz,"DocumentID") if Len(sDocumentID_1) = Len(fsNummern_Format)+6 then sNummern_Format=fsNummern_Format elseif Len(sDocumentID_1) < Len(fsNummern_Format)+6 then sNummern_Format=fsNummern_Format elseif Len(sDocumentID_1) = Len(fsNummern_Format)+7 then sNummern_Format= "0"& fsNummern_Format elseif Len(sDocumentID_1) = Len(fsNummern_Format)+8 then sNummern_Format= "00"& fsNummern_Format elseif Len(sDocumentID_1) = Len(fsNummern_Format)+9 then sNummern_Format= "000"& fsNummern_Format End if sJahr_1=Mid(sDocumentID_1,1,4) sMonat_1=Mid(sDocumentID_1,5,2) sNummer_1=Mid(sDocumentID_1,7) sJahr=Year(Now) sMonat=Month(Now) iMonat=Month(Now) if iMonat<10 then sMonat= "0" & Month(Now) End if if sJahr_1=sJahr then sJahr_2=sJahr_1 sNummer_2=sNummer_1 else sJahr_2=sJahr sNummer_2=sNummern_Format End if if sMonat_1=sMonat then sMonat_2=sMonat_1 else sMonat_2=sMonat End if sDocumentID_2=sJahr_2 & sMonat_2 & sNummer_2 SetDocUserProperty("oDocumentID_imp2", CLng(sDocumentID_2)) End if lDocumentID_import=lDocumentID_imp2 End Function
Function lDocumentID_export(iRefresh as integer) as long Dim sNummern_Format as String if iRefresh = 1 then sDocumentID_1=iMax_Datensatz(sKorrespondenz_export,"DocumentID") if Len(sDocumentID_1) = Len(fsNummern_Format)+6 then sNummern_Format=fsNummern_Format elseif Len(sDocumentID_1) < Len(fsNummern_Format)+6 then sNummern_Format=fsNummern_Format elseif Len(sDocumentID_1) = Len(fsNummern_Format)+7 then sNummern_Format= "0"& fsNummern_Format elseif Len(sDocumentID_1) = Len(fsNummern_Format)+8 then sNummern_Format= "00"& fsNummern_Format elseif Len(sDocumentID_1) = Len(fsNummern_Format)+9 then sNummern_Format= "000"& fsNummern_Format End if sJahr_1=Mid(sDocumentID_1,1,4) sMonat_1=Mid(sDocumentID_1,5,2) sNummer_1=Mid(sDocumentID_1,7) sJahr=Year(Now) sMonat=Month(Now) iMonat=Month(Now) if iMonat<10 then sMonat= "0" & Month(Now) End if if sJahr_1=sJahr then sJahr_2=sJahr_1 sNummer_2=sNummer_1 else sJahr_2=sJahr sNummer_2=sNummern_Format End if if sMonat_1=sMonat then sMonat_2=sMonat_1 else sMonat_2=sMonat End if sDocumentID_2=sJahr_2 & sMonat_2 & sNummer_2 SetDocUserProperty("oDocumentID_exp2", CLng(sDocumentID_2)) End if lDocumentID_export=lDocumentID_exp2 End Function
Function lDocumentID_Steuerung as Long sSQL1="select DocumentID from Steuerung where ClientID="& iClientID oRecord1=oResult(sSQL1) While oRecord1.next() lDocumentID_Steuerung=oRecord1.getLong(1) Wend End Function
Function lSerBrieListenID as Long sSQL1="select SerBrieListenID from Steuerung where ClientID="& iClientID oRecord1=oResult(sSQL1) While oRecord1.next() lSerBrieListenID=oRecord1.getLong(1) Wend End Function
Function fDocumentID as long sSQL1="select distinct DocumentID from "& sArbeitstabelle oRecord1=oResult(sSQL1) While oRecord1.next() fDocumentID=oRecord1.getInt(1) Wend End Function
Function lKontaktID as long sSQL1="select KontaktID from "& sKorrespondenz &" where DocumentID="& lDocumentID oRecord1=oResult(sSQL1) While oRecord1.next() lKontaktID=oRecord1.getString(1) Wend End Function
Function lAnsprechpartnerID as long sSQL1="select AnsprechpartnerID from "& sKorrespondenz &" where DocumentID="& lDocumentID oRecord1=oResult(sSQL1) While oRecord1.next() lAnsprechpartnerID=oRecord1.getString(1) Wend End Function
Function GetDocUserProperty(sPropertyName as String) As String Dim oUserProps As Object ' On Error Resume Next oUserProps = oDoc.DocumentProperties.getUserDefinedProperties() if oUserProps.getPropertySetInfo().hasPropertyByName(sPropertyName) = True then GetDocUserProperty = oUserProps.getPropertyValue(sPropertyName) else GetDocUserProperty = "" end if End Function
